dmca.title: Blogger DMCA Complaint- Relapse
dmca.body:
Relapse Records | Release Entertainment | P.O. Box 2060, Upper Darby, PA 19082
Tel: 610.734.1000 ext. 100 | Fax 610.734.3716 | email: Rennie@relapse.com

November 1, 2006


VIA FIRST CLASS MAIL

Google, Inc.
Attn: Blogger Legal Support
DMCA Complaints
1600 Amphitheatre Parkway
Mountain View, CA 94043

RE: INFRINGED COPYRIGHTS ON BLOGSPOT.COM

To Whom It May Concern::

The following sound recordings owned exclusivelt, throughout the universe, by Relapse Records, Inc. have been posted without the permission of Relapse Records, Inc. and constitute copyright infringement, in each instance:

Nasum 'Grind Finale', 'Shift', 'Helvete', 'Human 2.0', and 'Inhale/Exhale': http://grimdepot.blogspot.com/ posted on September 26, 2006.
Leng Tch'e 'The Process of Elimination': http://grimdepot.blogspot.com/ posted on September 26, 2006
Today Is The Day 'Kiss The Pig', 'Sadness Will Prevail', 'In The Eyes Of God' and 'Temple Of The Morning Star': http://grimdepot.blogspot.com/ posted on October 14, 2006.
Pig Destroyer 'Terrifyer': http://grimdepot.blogspot.com/ posted on October 23, 2006.

I have a good faith belief that use of the copyrighted materials described above on the allegedly infringing web pages is not authorized by the copyright owner, its agent, or the law. I swear, under penalty of perjury, that the information in the notification is accurate and that I am authorized to act on behalf of the owner of an exclusive right that is allegedly infringed.

Thank you in advance for your prompt attention to this matter.

Regards,

Reynold Jaffe
Director of Business and Legal Affairs
Relapse Records, Inc.
